cz.syntea.xdef.util

Class XsdToXdef

  • java.lang.Object
    • cz.syntea.xdef.util.XsdToXdef

  • public class XsdToXdef
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents XML Schema to X-definition convertor. (see main(String[]))

    • Method Detail

      • genCollection

        public static void genCollection(java.net.URL schemaURL,
                                 java.lang.String collectionFileName,
                                 java.lang.String xdefPrefix,
                                 java.io.PrintStream out)
                          throws java.lang.RuntimeException,
                                 java.lang.IllegalArgumentException,
                                 java.io.IOException
        Generates collection with X-definitions from root schema at given URL and saves file with given file name.
        Parameters:
        schemaURL - URL of root schema.
        collectionFileName - name of collection of X-definitions file.
        xdefPrefix - namespace prefix of X-definitions (if null then "xd").
        out - PrintStream where to print messages (if null then System.out).
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - not a schema at given URL.
        java.lang.RuntimeException - cant find X-definition generator implementation.
        java.io.IOException - if cannot create collection file.

      • genCollection

        public static void genCollection(java.lang.String schemaFilePath,
                                 java.lang.String collectionFileName,
                                 java.lang.String xdefPrefix,
                                 java.io.PrintStream out)
                          throws java.net.MalformedURLException,
                                 java.lang.RuntimeException,
                                 java.lang.IllegalArgumentException,
                                 java.io.IOException
        Generates collection with X-definitions from root schema at given path and saves file with given file name.
        Parameters:
        schemaFilePath - path to root schema file.
        collectionFileName - name of collection of X-definitions file.
        xdefPrefix - namespace prefix of X-definitions (if null then "xd").
        out - PrintStream where to print messages (if null then System.out).
        Throws:
        java.net.MalformedURLException - cant create URL from given path.
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - not a schema at given URL.
        java.lang.RuntimeException - cant find X-definition generator implementation.
        java.io.IOException - if cannot create collection file.

      • genCollection

        public static void genCollection(java.lang.String schemaFilePath,
                                 java.lang.String xdefPrefix,
                                 java.io.PrintStream out)
                          throws java.net.MalformedURLException
        Generates collection from a schema at given path and prints it to standard output.
        Parameters:
        schemaFilePath - path to schema file.
        xdefPrefix - namespace prefix of X-definitions (if null then "xd").
        out - PrintStream where to print messages (if null then System.out).
        Throws:
        java.net.MalformedURLException - url can not be created.

      • genCollection

        public static void genCollection(java.net.URL schemaURL,
                                 java.lang.String xdefPrefix,
                                 java.io.PrintStream out)
        Generates collection from a schema at given URL and prints it to standard output.
        Parameters:
        schemaURL - url of schema.
        xdefPrefix - namespace prefix of X-definitions (if null then "xd").
        out - PrintStream where to print messages (if null then System.out).

      • genXdefFiles

        public static void genXdefFiles(java.net.URL schemaURL,
                                java.lang.String directoryName,
                                java.lang.String xdefPrefix,
                                java.io.PrintStream out)
                         throws java.io.IOException
        Generates X-definition file per XML schema file from root schema at given URL and saves created file to directory with given name.
        Parameters:
        schemaURL - URL of root schema.
        directoryName - name of directory with created X-definition files.
        xdefPrefix - namespace prefix of X-definitions (if null then "xd").
        out - PrintStream where to print messages (if null then System.out).
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - not a valid schema at given URL.
        java.lang.RuntimeException - cant find implementation of X-definition generator.
        java.io.IOException - if cannot create X-definition files.

      • genXdefFiles

        public static void genXdefFiles(java.lang.String schemaFilePath,
                                java.lang.String directoryName,
                                java.lang.String xdefPrefix,
                                java.io.PrintStream out)
                         throws java.net.MalformedURLException,
                                java.io.IOException
        Generates X-definition file per XML schema file from root schema at given path and saves created file to directory with given name.
        Parameters:
        schemaFilePath - path to root schema file.
        directoryName - name of directory with created X-definition files.
        xdefPrefix - namespace prefix of X-definitions (if null then "xd").
        out - PrintStream where to print messages (if null then System.out).
        Throws:
        java.net.MalformedURLException - cant create URL from given path.
        java.lang.RuntimeException - cant find implementation of X-definition generator.
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - not a valid schema at given path.
        java.io.IOException - if cannot create X-definition files.

      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String... args)
        Run class from command line.
        Parameters:
        args - array of string with command line arguments:
        • -in, --input

          <PATH> input main schema location.

        • -out, --output

          <PATH> output file or directory.

        • -s, --output

          each schema generate to the separate X-definition file.

        • -p

          namespace prefix of X-definitions

        • -?, -h, --help help
